Description: UP FOR AUCTION IS MY 2016 EXCELLENT CONDITION EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD PRO PLUS TOP ELECTRIC GUITAR AND OHSC. THIS GUITAR IS IN THE VERY NICE ICED TEA FLAMETOP FINISH AND IT LOOKS FANTASTIC. THE GUITAR HAS TWO FINISH DINGS. ONE IS ON THE HEADSTOCK FACE BY THE "B" STRING TUNER AND THE OTHER IS ON THE BASS SIDE. BOTH ARE CLEARLY SHOWN IN THE PROVIDED PICS. OTHER THAN THAT THIS GUITAR HAS NO ISSUES AT ALL. IT IS A FANTASTIC LOOKING AND WONDERFUL PLAYING GUITAR THAT SOUNDS GREAT. AS YOU CAN CLEARLY SEE IN THE PICS IT HAS BEEN PLAYED VERY LITTLE. IT HAS A FANTASTIC EASY PLAYING NECK. THE ORIGINAL ORIGINAL ALNICO HUMBUCKER PICKUPS HAVE A NICE CLEAN VINTAGE TONE TO THEM BUT WILL REALLY GROWL WHEN PUSHED AND THE GUITAR IS NICE AND LIGHT/RESONANT. IT HAS BEEN PROFESSIONALLY CLEANED, POLISHED AND FACTORY SET UP WITH NEW STRINGS. THIS IS A FANTASTIC LOOKING AND WONDERFUL PLAYING GUITAR THAT IS SURE TO MAKE SOME LUCKY EBAYER VERY HAPPY. IF YOU HAVE ANY QUESTIONS CONCERNING THE GUITAR OR SHIPPING PLEASE FEEL FREE TO ASK/EMAIL PRIOR TO BIDDING. EXACT SHIPPING WEIGHT AND MEASUREMENTS FOR THIS GUITAR WILL BE 24 POUNDS AND 48x18x8 INCHES. (((PLEASE READ ))) due to the age of this guitar AND IT BEING LISTED AS A USED INSTRUMENT it IS BEING SOLD IN AN AS IS NO RESERVE AUCTION. (((RETURN POLICY))) MACONMUSIC STANDS BEHIND EVERY INSTRUMENT WE SELL. IF FOR ANY REASON THE WINNING BIDDER IS NOT SATISFIED PLEASE CONTACT MACONMUSIC THROUGH EBAY WITHIN (3 DAYS 72 HOURS) OF RECEIVING THE INSTRUMENT TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTS FOR RETURNING THE INSTRUMENT FOR A COMPLETE 100% REFUND (PURCHASE PRICE & ORIGINAL SHIPPING CHARGES). MACONMUSIC IS NOT RESPONSIBLE NOR WILL REIMBURSE/REFUND ANY RETURN SHIPPING FEES. AFTER THE 72 HOUR INSPECTION PERIOD HAS ENDED and there has been no contact by the WINNING BIDDER ALL SALES ARE FINAL WITH NO RETURNS. (((RECEIVED PAYMENT))) IS REQUIRED WITHIN 2 DAYS (48 HOURS) OF AUCTION ENDING DATE (NO EXCEPTIONS). (((HANDLING FEE))) DUE TO THE PRICE OF THIS GUITAR THE HANDLING FEE IS $ 45.00. IT IS INCLUDED IN THE S&H QUOTES. THIS INCLUDES FULL COVERAGE U.S.P.S. / UPS INSURANCE (UP TO $ 4500.00). IF ADDITIONAL INSURANCE IS REQUIRED IT WILL BE ADDED TO THE TOTAL AMOUNT OF THE EBAY AUCTION ENDING CHECKOUT, (((SHIPPING))) YOUR GUITAR WILL BE SHIPPED IN A USPS APPROVED GUITAR SHIPPING BOX WITH NEW BUBBLE WRAP AND NEW PACKING PEANUTS. ANY SPECIAL SHIPPING REQUIREMENTS SHOULD BE ADDRESSED PRIOR TO BIDDING. ALL U.S.A. & INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS AGREE TO PAY EXACT SHIPPING. U.S.A. SHIPPING WILL BE BY U.S.P.S. PRIORITY or parcel select MAIL (FULLY INSURED). CANADA AND INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING WILL BE BY U.S.P.S. INTERNATIONAL PRIORITY MAIL. EXACT SHIPPING WEIGHTS FOR ALL ITEMS WILL BE INCLUDED IN ITEM DESCRIPTION. (((ATTENTION INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS))) DUE TO NEW USPS INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING REQUIREMENTS THE ACTUAL PURCHASE AMOUNT OF INSURANCE COVERAGE MAY NOT BE AVAILABLE. IN MOST COUNTRIES THE MAX AMOUNT ALLOWED BY U.S.P.S. WILL NOW BE $ 600.00. OTHER COUNTRIES THE AMOUNT TO INSURE CAN BE NONE. IF YOU WISH TO BID ON THIS GUITAR PLEASE CHECK THE USPS WEBSITE FOR YOUR COUNTRIES USPS INSURANCE COVERAGE AND REQUIREMENTS. THANKS FOR LOOKING AND HAPPY BIDDING
